title: Missing Skins
body: What do? Im missing 3 skins from my 3 favorite champions I KNOW I had bought. What's the deal?

replies.body:
Hey GoliothOnline,

You'd mentioned you bought them, is this correct? They weren't gifted via a friend? 

If content, such as skins, are removed, it's usually due to two situations - 

1) If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2) If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If neither of these instances apply to you, please submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support so we can investigate the issue further.
